title: (4760-010) Vila Nova de Famalicão - 126 Avenida do Brasil
title_short: (4760-010) Vila Nova de Famalicão - 126 Avenida do Brasil

title: (4760-409) Vila Nova de Famalicão - 332 Avenida Marechal Humberto Delgado
title_short: (4760-409) Vila Nova de Famalicão - 332 Avenida Marechal Humberto Delgado
description: Parking next to the park.

title: (4760) Vila Nova de Famalicão - 5 Rua Frei Bartolomeu dos Mártires
title_short: (4760) Vila Nova de Famalicão - 5 Rua Frei Bartolomeu dos Mártires
description: Parking next to the new Church of Santiago de Antas. Quiet and fairly smooth place to stop to eat. we don't sleep here. but on a weekday it was empty.

name: Woodstill Oaks
title: (4760-783) Woodstill Oaks
description:
We are creating a space inserted in nature.

Updates: 
- Access to the property widened to 4 meters;
- There are several vines sprouting through the ground. We kindly ask you to be as careful as possible when moving around the property;
- We kindly ask you to contact us to confirm space availability. 

Under development.
It is a property with natural fence about 50 meters from the municipal road in an extremely quiet place for contemplation of nature.  Access to the property is 4 meters wide.  At the moment we can only offer tranquility in a reserved space.  We love our trees very much;  some older than us.
 We kindly ask you to respect the space;  we have our vines growing and we think there is room for everyone, the campers and the existing nature.  We don't even have a garbage disposal as we believe that each user will take their own to the nearest place, about 150 meters from the exit.
 About 150 meters from the site, there is an equestrian center and an excellent restaurant if you want to try the local cuisine.  Within a radius of 1 km you can also visit good wine cellars and cheese makers selling to the public.  There are markets, bakeries and a bank very close to the site.
It is expressly forbidden to throw garbage to the floor and make fire.

title: (4770) Cruz - 480 Largo Senhor dos Aflitos
description: Children's playground and picnic area next to a church.

title: (4760) Ribeirão - 5 Avenida Central
description:
Quiet place to spend the night, we went to visit the Atlantic bird contest.


It's like the back of a shopping center, where trucks usually spend the night. There are public toilets that were surprisingly clean. The street is illuminated with streetlights.

title: (4770) Sezures - 422 Avenida das Cerdeirinhas
description: Mandatory stopping place. Quiet, lots of drinking water. Tables, covered area, curtains, great views.

title: (4705) São Pedro De Oliveira - Tv. da Volta do Carro
title_short: (4705) São Pedro De Oliveira - Tv. da Volta do Carro
description: The parking lot of a free public swimming pool (9am-10pm) with many tables and benches and a grill. There is also a kiosk selling ice cream and drinks on site. However, this is not always open. Officially, however, this is only for the residents of the area. The front parking lot is easy to see and sunny, the rear one is a bit quieter and shady.

title: (4780) Fonte da Galega - 116 Rua Saudade
description: Quiet park

title: (4780) - 361 Rua Rabada
description: Next to a wonderful park. We spent the night as enjoyed the facilities in the morning. Workout area, agility, river…

title: (4780-368) Santo Tirso - 5 Largo Abade Pedrosa
description: It is the square of the cathedral is a quiet and beautiful place to walk

title: (4785) Trofa - 647 Rua Cónegos de Landim
description: Small car park opposite the main market square (Attention: market from 6 a.m. to 2 p.m. only on Saturdays). Quiet place, not too much traffic at night. Ideal for troubleshooting one night.

title: (4780) Santo Tirso - 115 Travessa das Rãs
description: 3 parking spaces, reserved for motorhomes, monitored by camera, quiet at night, bakery 50m away, emptying area 400m away at the Auchan store. Shims required.

title: (4785-187) Trofa - 306 Rua Infante Dom Henrique
description: Self laudry service, modern machines. Wifi and coffee available as well.

title_short: (4780) Santo Tirso - 44 Rua do Casal Velho
description: Good place, quiet for the night, street. Services within walking distance.

title: (4780) Santo Tirso - 152 Rua Mãe d'Água
description: Free service area next to Jumbo.

title: (4785) Trofa - 318 Rua Doutor António Faria
description: Picnic park, quiet but without services. There are tables and cozy shade. There are two tables, it is in the middle of a town in a large park.

title_short: (4780) Couto (S. Miguel) - 382 Rua Padre Luís Gonzaga Martins Pinheiro

title: (4755-520) Várzea - 127 Rua de São Bento

name: Camping Ave
title: (4480) Camping Ave
description:
For nature lovers

Welcome to the Camping Ave, located on one of the largest courses of water in northern Portugal – Rio Ave, which will flow into the Atlantic Ocean, a distance of few kilometres. The beaches of Vila do Conde and Póvoa de Varzim, are the sites closest to the park for all salt-water beachgoers.
Perfectly framed in nature, which has enriched with its vegetation carefully selected with care to preserve the national species and in order to move closer to vegetation in northern Europe.
Here it is natural to enjoy a peaceful scenario, ideal for nature lovers, and all those whose work and stress of life that we live call for a break, either on holiday or weekends, as great way to regain energy.
For those who prefer urban centers, with all their social, gastronomy, monuments, recreation and culture, Camping Ave is equidistant from the various urban centers of northern Portugal, to know: Vila do Conde, Póvoa de Varzim, Porto, Vila Nova de Famalicão, Trofa, Barcelos, Braga…
Thank you for your inquiry and look forward to your visit.

title: (4765) Guardizela - 428 Rua da Calçada
description: Picnic park where you can make fire, some tables, parking for two vehicles (by the road) without water.

title: (4755) Pereira - 4755 CM1111
description:
Very nice, view from the hill to the sea.
The public toilet is doing the job.

title: (4825) - Rua Senhora do Padrão
description: Spot away from the main road. calm. at the archaeological site of "Castro de monte padrao". Walks and views. accessible all vehicles. no services. flat terrain.

title: (4755) Areias de Vilar - 15 Lugar do Socorro
title_short: (4755) Areias de Vilar - 15 Lugar do Socorro
description: Picnic area in front of a church, several tables available. About twenty parking spaces. Shaded area, with water tap and toilets (closed during our visit).

title: (4705-265) Braga - Unnamed Road
description:
Laundromat, a little expensive.
located behind Leclerc, parking accessible by going around

title: (4750) Manhente - Rua do Rio
description:
A somewhat uneven sandy parking lot with trees and shade.  Suitable for cars, motorhomes and camper vans that are not too big.

Fine pebble position 100 meters long and max. 30 meters wide.  Pebble river shallow, without plants and clear water and sparkling waterfall.

Cozy piece of nature with 10 picnic tables and 1 barbeque.  Recommended!

title: (4750) Tamel (São Veríssimo) - 111 Travessa do Cávado
description: Very quiet place. No services. Riverside.

title: (4750-331) Barcelos - 38 Rua Rosa Ramalho
description: Free parking, WC available in swimming pool area

title: (4750-303) Barcelos - 119 Rua Rosa Ramalho
description: Nice place next to the beautiful river beach. Very busy with locals on sunny days, we stayed the night and it was very peaceful.

title: (4750-304) Barcelos - 290 Avenida João Paulo II
description: Parking in front of the Barcelos segundaria school 800m from the historic center all museums are free!!! pretty town Avoid on Thursday, market day

title: (4750) Barcelos - 322 Rua Doutor José António Peixoto Pereira Machado
title_short: (4750) Barcelos - 322 Rua Doutor José António Peixoto Pereira Machado

address.street: 322 Rua Doutor José António Peixoto Pereira Machado

title: (4705) Esporões - Unnamed Road
description: On top of a mountain with very nice views and plenty of parking spots. There are chapels, there is a big monument and picknick benches all around. We we're here on 1st of January 2020 and there were locals going for walks at daytime, but at nighttime it was very quiet. Good and safe place! No services in winter. Looks like in summer it could be more active.

title: (4805) Nespereira - Unnamed Road / Capela das Senhoras do Monte, Serzedelo
title_short: (4805) Nespereira - Unnamed Road /  Capela das Senhoras do Monte, Serzedelo
description: Great point of view to land and see the city at night or watch a sunset. Continue to the top to find flatter places. Be careful steep and small ways to get there. Not recommended for motorhomes!

address.street: Unnamed Road /  Capela das Senhoras do Monte, Serzedelo

title: (4750) Barcelos - 149 Rua Duques de Bragança
description: Quiet and river side. Barcelos.

title: (4705-185) Braga - 3 Travessa da Ilha
description: Self Service Laundry at Intermarche Braga.

title: (4700-222) Ferreiros - 37 Praceta do Magistério
description: Laundromat

title: (4705-259) Braga - 37 Rua dos Presidentes
description: Really great laundry!

title: (4705) Esporões -
description:
Lightly accessible by vans, fully accessible 4x4. NOT accessible by motorhome.

Incredible view, no street noise

title: () Braga - A11
description: GPL station in Braga

title: (4745) Alvarelhos - Avenida do Santuário
description: Great sunrise and far views in all directions on a hilltop next to a church. Two small bars/restaurants are nearby. The water tap is accessible. When I was there in October, the toilets were closed and there was no event going on at the church. You have to make friends with the sound of the bell, since it rings from 6 in the morning until 22h. Perfect for morning meditation, since the bell make sure that you stay focused ;)

name: Camping Braga
title: () Camping Braga
description: Small, very basic campsite with access to the municipal swimming pool directly below. Ideal for visiting the historic center. Device for emptying the motorhome. The campsite is well shaded. Friendly staff. Places for mobile homes and tents, wooden cabins. Good to start. Sanitary building in the upper part of the square is clean, but outdated. New sanitary building in the lower part of the square was great. Cooking areas, ovens, rental refrigerators. 5 Stars.

title: (4805) Guimarães - Rua dos Carvalhais
description: Decathlon parking. 10 minutes from the historic center. In the city we park relatively close to the center.

title: (4595) Penamaior -
description: On top of a hill overlooking the surrounding urban area, a quiet place with some trees. Not clean everywhere. Small tourist attraction: a large chair (Trono panomarico do Marco Branco).

title: (4700) Mire de Tibães - CM1321
description: Parking to visit the splendid monastery. Attention closing on Monday

title: (4805) Sande (São Martinho) - 16 Largo do Assento
description: Very spacious place ideal for parking and pernoita. It is possible to supply water by asking the owner of the adjoining house.

title: (4750) Lama -
description: Source - Fonte da Poça. very idyllic spot in the middle of the forest just before Braga. A small nature and adventure area has been created around the source. All made very cute. Everywhere paths and paths that invite you to walk and cycle. The last end of the trail is off-road, but should be passable even with normal cars. With the ground clearance of a van or SUV you can definitely get here. The place is perhaps only suitable to a limited extent for overnight stays, as there is not much room to stand. But beautifully secluded in the forest.

title: (4700-565) Mire de Tibães -
description: Possibility of day and night parking at the entrance to the esplanade before the entrance to the “Tibaes monastery”. The monastery to visit (3 stars in the backpacker's guide) also has a possibility of accommodation (hotel). Very calm…

title: (4700-034) Braga - 523 Avenida da Imaculada Conceição
description:
It is Lidl parking.
Very good spot to walk to the center of Braga, it is only 10 minutes and you do not have to enter narrow streets

title: (4805) Caldelas - 449 Rua do Comandante Carvalho Crato
title_short: (4805) Caldelas - 449 Rua do Comandante Carvalho Crato
description: On the Intermarche - Perfect for water and drain services, only two parking spaces

title: (4700-028) Braga - 11 Rua Damião de Góis
description: Perfect for seeing the city. It is 1 normal paid parking and has few spaces, but AC fits and the location is very good

title: (4745-514) Sao Romao do Coronado - 1006 Rua Horizonte
title_short: (4745-514) Sao Romao do Coronado - 1006 Rua Horizonte
description: Small but nice place. Perfect location 5 minutes walk to the train to the city center. Outdoor showers, toilets and a bar. Pay via envelope and mailbox.

title: (4715) Braga - N309
description: Amazing and very peaceful place. Lots of stone picnic benches. Right next to a pretty amazing church that is no longer in use with stunning views of all of Braga. Shady and flat places. A large space also with access to walks. It seems unlikely to be able to sleep on this place and yet we have the right to park where we want. There is room for many motorhomes and for all types despite a bumpy path going up in the ground.

title: (4705-097) Braga - 130 Rua do Fujacal
description: Self service laundry

title: (4705) Braga - Avenida Doutor Francisco Pires Gonçalves
title_short: (4705) Braga - Avenida Doutor Francisco Pires Gonçalves
description: Free public park. Close to the historical center (600 meters). Avoid days of heavy rain and wind. Complicated in the month of June - Festivities of the city - São João and in the days of weekly fair (Tuesday). Easy access to sunrise or sunset. Local with some noise. Lots of shade in the summer.

title: (4715-213) Braga - 37 Rua Santo Adrião
description: Parking of the adventure park, away from the city, about 10 minutes by car. Calm. Cafeteria and activity park

title: (4745) Alvarelhos - N318
description:
Guarded parking space at a park. 4 minute drive (15 minute walk trough the park) from an camper shop. There are toilets, bins and an ice cream stand (closed on our visit in November).
4 long places , where you can stand when it is quiet. The other places were a little short, which can cause problems.

title: (4715) Braga - Rua Doutor Humberto Soeiro
description: Alternative location. Easy and good parking. 1 km from the historical center. Quiet place.

title: (4715-005) Braga - 37 Praça Araújo Carandá
description: Laundromat

title: (4700-216) Braga - 9 Rua Cónego Doutor António José Ribeiro
title_short: (4700-216) Braga - 9 Rua Cónego Doutor António José Ribeiro
description: Self service laundry

address.street: 9 Rua Cónego Doutor António José Ribeiro

title: (4700) Parada de Tibães - R. de Sao Goncalo
title_short: (4700) Parada de Tibães - R. de Sao Goncalo
description: Clean and very recent laundry room with WC and wifi. Payment only in cash.

name: Le camping Caldas das Taipas
title: (4805-156) Le camping Caldas das Taipas
description: The municipal campsite Caldas das Taipas is next to the city park, the swimming pool and a sports hall. It is only open in the summer season, the reception welcomes you from 8am to 11pm. we were pleasantly surprised the sanitary facilities are brand new and very clean. Too bad the showers are not very hot

title: (4805) Caldelas - R.do Fogueteiro
description: Flat and calm place

title: (4715-213) Braga - Praça Doutor Cândido da Costa Pires
title_short: (4715-213) Braga - Praça Doutor Cândido da Costa Pires
description:
Parking in front of a medical center.  Place paying for the day. Night not recommended because there is a disco: 'Sardinha Biba' from midnight to 7am. Not good.
The oder side of the street, its possible, near scool. Free.

address.street: Praça Doutor Cândido da Costa Pires

title: (4715-122) BRAGA - Praceta André Soares
description:
Free and quuet parking, with secure location. Near the entrance hall of the André Soares school. 
500 meters from the historic center.
In school period, better arrive after 18h.
Good for weekends.
Park back on the grass.

title: (4715-249) Braga - 9/9A Avenida Robert Smith
description: Self serve laundry in the covered parking of Minho Shopping Centre. 2.5m height limit for undercover parking, 2.2m height limit for parking directly above, however parking lot just opposite next to car wash and fuel station with no height limit. Cash only (notes and coins) - or download the app to pay by phone. Discount card available for slight discount. Toilet, WiFi and multiple shopping possibilities in shopping centre above while you wait.

title: (4750) Vila Boa - 200 Rua do Faial
description: Brand new Intermarché in Barcelos, two service bays. On the side there is also the Laundromat and the coffee shop, very convenient.

title: (4700) Real - 513 Rua 5 de Outubro
description: 3 places for motorhomes in the parking lot of a shopping center, in uber about 4 euros to the center.

title: (4715-009) Braga -
description: Picnic area with parking places near the Ecovia (green way), around 10 min walking to the city centre. Just beside Rio Este (East River, a tiny river that passes through Braga but you can't see in the map.) The green way continues west from this point and reaches the park (S.Joao da Ponte) and east reaching a sports complex with public toilets. (Rodovia). there are drinking water spots all allong the Ecovia.

title: (4700) Mire de Tibães - Av. de Rio
title_short: (4700) Mire de Tibães - Av. de Rio
description: Nice shaded spot for a swim, lunch or a quite night. There is a small bar (from the local football club) for drinks. Owner offered us electricity for the night! Disadvantage is the church opposite the river Csvado that is very loud at 8 o'clock.

title: (4715-343) Braga - 79 Rua José António Cruz
description: “Ja Abriu” - Laundry - Self service. Very clean. 1 x 11kg and 1 x 18kg washing machines. 3 x drying machines. There is also ironing and clothes alteration service.

title: (4805-108) Caldelas - 226 Rua dos Cutileiros
description: Picnic area with table, barbecue, soccer field, volleyball court. Swimming possible in the Agrela river.

title: (4700-087) Braga - Parque Norte R. de Montecastro
title_short: (4700-087) Braga - Parque Norte R. de Montecastro
description: Large parking area for the football stadium. Parking and overnight accommodation except on stadium use days.

title: (4755) Fornelos - Unnamed Road
description: The spot next to the river is not ok for sleeping, only for a picknick. This spot is under the trees. We hade a good night

title: () Braga - N309
description:
Water point. 
Seems to be fresh and clear.

title: (4715-279) Braga - 26 Rua António de Mariz
description: Makro retail supermarket parking lot. It has many parking spaces.

title: (4715-213) Braga - 19 Rua da Fábrica
description: Free park, day and night, all vehicles. Near playground, near cycling line to city center. 20 minutes walking and 5min bus stop to city center. Shadow or sun, night lighting, safe place, near shopping  centre. Public wc. But a bit noisy from the roads.

title: (4700) Frossos - 72 Rua Quinta da Goja
description: Quiet place near schools and sports center. Without noises

title: (4805) Guimarães - 601 Rua de São Miguel
description: Large flat and open parking lot at empty industrial hall. Apparently free to use for parking.

title: (4745) Trofa - E1
description: It’s a gas station with a lot of parking lots, parking lots that fits motorhomes. There’s also a hotel. The grocery is not very large and doesn’t have a variety of items. It’s mainly used by truck drivers.

title: (4710-487) Braga -
description: Flat illuminated parking spaces of approximately 5.50 m each. on a quiet road. At the rear a supermarket and a pasteleria.

title: (4800) Fermentões - 64 Rua das Coradeiras de Baixo
title_short: (4800) Fermentões - 64 Rua das Coradeiras de Baixo
description: Pic nic al lado del rio hay un Puente Romano fuente mesas barbacoa

title: (4750) Perelhal - Unnamed Road
description: Beach at the Rio Cavado. In the high season certainly not recommended. Departure very steep with low-hanging trees. 4x4 or a lot of momentum required. Without installation.

title: (4710-340) Braga - 157 Rua da Quinta da Armada
title_short: (4710-340) Braga - 157 Rua da Quinta da Armada
description: Parking to go to Braga Parque 2 minutes on foot, secure enough we parked there 2 afternoons without worries.

title: (4715-616) Braga - 15 Avenida do Santuārio
description: Place Authorized by the GNR (Local Authority) to stay overnight, the other parks do not allow us to stay overnight.

title: (4710-404) Braga - 39 Avenida dos Lusíadas
description: Free public parking. Without services. A little away from the center (20 minutes on foot to the Cathedral) but very useful during the month of June, because with the parties it is impossible to park in the center.

title: (4835-010) Guimarães - 703 Rua Professor Abel Salazar
description: Free parking spaces, at the front of the apartments, suitable for small camper vans <6 mtr. On the other side a large shopping center.

title: (4715-616) Braga - 44 Avenida Nossa Senhora do Sameiro
title_short: (4715-616) Braga - 44 Avenida Nossa Senhora do Sameiro
description: Very large car park in front of the sanctuary, a little flatter than the neighboring car parks. Fountain and picnic tables nearby. The sanctuary rings from 7 o'clock.

title: (4715-616) Braga - 44 Avenida Nossa Senhora do Sameiro
title_short: (4715-616) Braga - 44 Avenida Nossa Senhora do Sameiro
description: Public toilets with plenty of parking space, picnic table and the beautiful Nossa sanctuary

title: (4715-616) Braga - 88 Avenida Nossa Senhora do Sameiro
title_short: (4715-616) Braga - 88 Avenida Nossa Senhora do Sameiro
description:
Shady earth parking accessible to any size motorhome with garbage cans and toilets a point to eat closed on March 28, 2023 many quiet picnic tables for the night 200 meters from the sanctuary of Our Lady of Sameiro
It is one of the most visited places of Marian devotion in Portugal

title: (4715) Braga - 3 N309
description: Parking near the sanctuary with many places.

title: (4805-015) Prazins (Santa Eufémia) - 2024 Rua Manuel Ribeiro
description: Barco's Lazer Park car park. Swimming possible in Rio Ave.

title: (4700-045) Dume - 30 Rua António Alves Rei
description: Parking with very wide and long spaces near a playground. not far from a large shopping center. calm night

title: (4800-073) Guimarães -
description: Large public car park at Guimaraes football stadium. Supermarket and old center 5 minutes walk.

title: (4815) Vizela - 629 N106
description: Optimal quiet park to visit Parque das Termas de Vizela. Pingo Doce supermarket, 100m away.

title: (4715) Braga - Largo do Arco
description: Parking day and night, possibility to take the funicular to go to visit Bom Jesus.

title: (4800-073) Azurém - 442 Rua Teixeira de Pascoais
description: Laundromat with wifi

title: (4700) Braga - N309
description: Small area of land on one side of the road with panoramic views of the city of Braga. It is on the side of the road so it can be noisy, although it is a road that does not have much traffic.

title: (4715) Braga - 77 Estrada de São Pedro
description:
Car park for the Bom Jesus sanctuary funicular. Come in the evening after closing to have a free space. About 5 comfortable places under the trees. close to the ascent of the sanctuary on foot with its 577 steps. A magnificent sunset at the top.
Self-service/free/no amenities parking. peaceful for the night. Pure vida!

title: (4810-534) Guimarães - 1282 Avenida Dom João IV
description: Free car park next to Guimaraes train station. Shopping center and supermarket 3 minutes, Palacio Cultural Center Vila Flor 5 minutes walk.

title: (4715) Braga - 8 Caminho do Sameiro
description:
Another parking lot at the Bom Jesus. There is an automatic gate. We asked a park guard and he admitted we could stay for some days. 
At the park you'll find picnic tables, small lake with boats, playground, bar with sandwiches, ice cream and free toilets.

title: (4810-225) Guimarães - 493 Rua Camilo Castelo Branco
description: Rammed earth car park, in a quiet residential area a stone's throw from the historic center. Quiet night.

title: (4710-057) Braga - 24 Rua Velha de Barros
description: Water Fountain

title: (4475-076) Castelo da Maia -
description: Parked for 2 nights. Quiet and safe. Residencial area. Close to a Pingo Doce and couple km from a Jumbo.

title: (4700) Braga - 32 Rua de Ruães
description: Beautiful quiet and flat location on a paved surface. Fantastic view of the river Cávado with many picnick tables on the grass. There are plenty of trees but also open places to park the camper (bus). The road there is narrow but accessible. No facilities such as water and electricity.

title: (4800-432) Guimarães - 1 Largo Martins Sarmento
description: Next to palace drinking fountain for water bottles

title: (4715) Braga - Largo do Santuário do Bom Jesus
title_short: (4715) Braga - Largo do Santuário do Bom Jesus
description: Parking spot in Bom Jezus area in Braga.

address.street: Largo do Santuário do Bom Jesus

title: (4805) Tabuadelo - 244 Rua de São Cipriano
description:
A magnificent place surrounded by nature in the countryside but close to the urban center of Guimarães. The owner allows walks through the surrounding woods.
The site has a black and grey discharge center and a water charging point.
There is a cafe and grocery store very close and a supermarket less than 5 minutes away with a gas station.
The owner is still carrying out the construction of the space but already allows its use.
Contact: 960085233

title: (4715) Braga - Av. da Igreja
description: Free and quiet parking. There are rubbish bins and a playground with WC. Drinking water source in the park but it is not good for recharging water. Next to the cemetery and with little traffic. The main parking spaces are too small for large motorhomes but these could be parked next to the playground.

title: (4480-876) Vila do Conde - 1 Rua Dom Sancho I
title_short: (4480-876) Vila do Conde - 1 Rua Dom Sancho I
description: Spot in the middle of nature, in the middle of the city. there is nothing. so take your rubbish with you. our night here went well. From 11 p.m. we could no longer hear the road. and even the neighboring firefighters were discreet.

title: (4810) Guimarães - 220C Parque das Hortas
description: The other parking was used for a funfair, so we took this car park. I only recommend it in case of emergency, it is very noisy. Do not hesitate to use the cable car to explore the old town ...

title: (4750) Perelhal -
description: Magnificent place in the middle of nature, we were alone it was great Accessible by van or van only 2M wide max. 50m sand path to finish, enjoy

title: (4810) Guimarães - 15 Rua Dona Urraca
description: It is a fairly wide street where you can stop the motorhome, without traffic and overlooking the castle of Guimaraës. It is very quiet, the only thing that you can not park from 9:00 pm to 7:00 am, so you can not stay overnight. 50 meters from the castle.

title: (4480-669) Vila do Conde - 233 Acesso Particular
description: Parking at the roadside. Also suitable for large campers, provided there is space. Stood here for 2 hours to walk to the monastery. But also city sightseeing possible.

title: (4730-452) Vila de Prado - 22 Travessa da Fontainha
title_short: (4730-452) Vila de Prado - 22 Travessa da Fontainha
description: Flat, grassy terrain with plenty of places to stand. No prohibition sign. Very quiet because at the end of a road. Local fishermen are there as are young lovers trying to count flowers in their car. You are at the water's edge and under the trees. Hard to get over !!! Also, the photos of the place in front (paved parking lot) were probably taken there. Please keep this place clean as it is only 15 minutes from Braga.

title: (4810) Guimarães - Rua do Rei Pegu
description:
Parking area in cord. Free parking. One way street and very well located.
We have been here two days and no problem.
At the foot of the funicular and 15 minutes walking, with children of the Castle.

title: (4810) Guimarães - 36 Rua de Dona Mafalda
description:
Very large free parking in front of the castle. Lots of trees and shaded places. No parking from 21:00 to 07:00.

Ps: this is NOT the battlefield of the battle of Sao Mamede. Google Maps lies :>>

title: (4810-025) Guimarães - Rua do Rei Pegu
description: Day parking for long vehicles, ideal for visiting the city, about 15 minutes from the center on foot. Busy during the day and without services.

title: (4730-452) Vila de Prado - 22 Travessa da Fontainha
title_short: (4730-452) Vila de Prado - 22 Travessa da Fontainha
description: Location in the shade under the trees to rest and eat in front of the water and a kiwi field. Flat ground - please leave the area clean.

title: (4810) Guimarães - Rua Bernardino Jordão
description: Day / night parking on dirt adjacent to the official parking area. Suitable if you have vehicles longer than 6.5 meters. A short distance away (50 meters) there are the loading and unloading columns of the parking area. The historic center is about 8-10 minutes on foot

title: (4485) Mindelo - 693 N13
description: Air and fresh water at the gas station.

title: (4715) Braga -
description: Area with picnic tables and lots of trees! there's a little church.

title: (4495-252) Póvoa de Varzim - 55 Rua 25 de Abril
title_short: (4495-252) Póvoa de Varzim - 55 Rua 25 de Abril
description: Campervan parking space just for parking

title: (4810) Guimarães - 147 Rua José Faria Martins
description: Perfect place to visit the city. The parking lot is located directly at the valley station of the cable car to Serra da Pehna. The access road is not very wide. And the places quite narrow and short.

title: (4700) Merelim (São Paio) - 36 Rua João Dias Soares
title_short: (4700) Merelim (São Paio) - 36 Rua João Dias Soares
description: It is a parking lot on a river beach. To spend the night it is quiet but in non-summer months as it will be very crowded. Ideal for vans and AC no more than 6m. The squares are not very big.

title: (4480-134) Azurara - 1 Rua Nossa Senhora das Neves
title_short: (4480-134) Azurara - 1 Rua Nossa Senhora das Neves

title_short: (4495-131) Póvoa de Varzim - Rua do Graceiro
description: Park of the city of Povoa de Barzim. Parking with some shade during the day, guarded at night. It has clean toilets with paper.

title: (4485) Mindelo - 227 Rua Eça de Queirós
description: Parking of Mindelo Station. Perfect for parking during the day and visiting Porto. You have to take a Z5 card to reach the center of Porto in 40 minutes.

title: (4480-647) Vila do Conde - 1568 Rua 5 de Outubro, R. Nº 61 1594
title_short: (4480-647) Vila do Conde - 1568 Rua 5 de Outubro, R. Nº 61 1594
description: Automatic laundry. Washing powder is included in the price.

title: (4810) Guimarães - 354 Rua Professor Egas Moniz
description: Shaded street and flat to spend the day and night. Attention garage on the cob so difficult for more than six meters. Park and city center nearby.

name: Parque de Campismo de Vila do Conde
title: (4480-095) Parque de Campismo de Vila do Conde
title_short: (4480-095) Parque de Campismo de Vila do Conde
description:
Camping Vila do Conde / Árvore 

The Vila do Conde campsite is located in a magnificent location close to the beach. Equipped with excellent facilities, it provides all users with a pleasant leisure space during the holidays, but also a good place to rest throughout the year. 

Entrance: 9:00 am to 7:00 pm Departure: until 17:00 hours 

Visits: 9:00 to 24:00 hours 
Departure and entry of vehicles: 7:00 to 24:00 hours.

Adress: R. do Gaiato 300, 4480 Azurara, Portugal Azurara Porto 
Average Price: Between 20 & 30 EUR 
Capacity for Motorhomes (MotorHomes):  25 seats Coverage: Uncovered (Outdoors) 
Exclusive to Motorhomes: No 
Floor: Grass(Grass) 
Isolated: No 
Security: Very Good 
GPS: Latitude: 41.336199 - Longitude: -8.735268 DEGREES: 41 º 20' 10.316" - -8 º 44' 6.964"

title: (4480-754) Vila do Conde - 31F Rua do Cais dos Assentos
title_short: (4480-754) Vila do Conde - 31F Rua do Cais dos Assentos
description: An excellent and modern launderette with large and small washers. Doesn't take credit cards though, only coins or a card that you have to buy separately (just take coins it's easier)

title: (4730-450) Prado - 23 Largo Antunes Lima
description:
São Sebastião, Vila de Prado      
Terça-feira de manhã é dia de feira semanal -
Tuesday morning is weekly market day -
Le mardi matin est le jour du marché hebdomadaire - El martes por la mañana es el día de mercado semanal

title: (4480-655) Vila do Conde - 82 Avenida Baltazar do Couto
title_short: (4480-655) Vila do Conde - 82 Avenida Baltazar do Couto
description: Good laundromat! And easy parking next door.

title: (4730) Vila de Prado - Avenida do Cávado
title_short: (4730) Vila de Prado - Avenida do Cávado
description: Vila de Prado, Cávado River, Nice river beach Faial Restaurant, Police and Health care near.

title: (4480) Azurara - Rua das Salinas
description: Quiet beach. Several parking areas. Attention, place very badly attended the night.

title: (4750-000) Porto -
description: There are some showers that belong to the restaurant. You leave them an identification document and they give you the key. There are separate men's and women's restrooms.

title: (4475) Barca - Rua de José Moreira da Silva
title_short: (4475) Barca - Rua de José Moreira da Silva
description: It is a parking space at the "Mandim" Metro Station. Since we have a lot of free space with ACs, we can park freely. Appropriate place to park / spend the night, embora esteja longe de tudo. I don't have the Metro at 20 more and I can visit Maia, Porto, Matosinhos, etc. You can buy senha for or Metro in a vending machine. Tem um Ecocaminho 50 meters away from the Maia Zoo and the center of Maia

address.street: Rua de José Moreira da Silva

title: (4470) Maia - R. Chascada
description: It is a huge parking lot in a Commercial Area (Auchan, JOM, Norauto, Low Cost Fuel and Gas, MacDonalds, etc). Access must be made from the back of Auchan and in the direction of the Fuel Pump. The Park is enormous and safe. Close to Metro but close to "Parque Industrial" or "Mandim". It can be a little noisy as it faces the road.

title: (4800) - 1220 Rua Portelinha
description: Small roadside parking lot with little traffic. Nice and quiet view for the night. Slight slope but with the holds no problems. Facing a cute church whose bell tower remains silent at night. It nevertheless resumes at 7 a.m. so perfect if you take the road early, perhaps annoying if you get up late. No dogs barking at night, which seems to be rare enough in the area to clarify this.

title: (4485) Modivas - Av. Fonte Cova 400 400
description: Fashion Outlet Porto ... free daily parking with metro connection to the city center ... 3.40 single ticket..Trinidad get off

title: (4750-000) Porto - Autoestrada A3
description:
Service area with tree-lined picnic area.

There are also free showers with hot water.
Ask in the restaurant near the gas station for shower keys.

title: (4480) Cabreiro - 685 Travessa de Farilhe
description: Official beach parking, easy access to dune walkway and beach. At the back of the restaurant are public toilets (not the cleanest) which are closed during the night. Right in front of the toilets are large waste containers and one foot shower. Sadly no 'real' showers on the whole (!) Beach.

title: (4810-000) Guimaraes - Unnamed Road
description: On the road to the campsite, 200 meters before arriving at the parking lot, you will find a path that goes down to a picnic table. If you ever miss the path you will see the spot which is just below the road. We spent a very good night there in peace and the next day we took advantage of the shade of the trees and the walks and monuments nearby. The spot is only accessible for one small van.

title: (4810) Guimarães - N101-2
description: Free camper pitch, only for parking

title: (4480) Vila do Conde - 16 Rua do Cordoeiro
title_short: (4480) Vila do Conde - 16 Rua do Cordoeiro
description: Full every weekend by the campervans. Next to the beach. A bit difficult parking due to the sand on the ground.

title: (4810) Guimarães - 56 Rua Monte de Santa Catarina
title_short: (4810) Guimarães - 56 Rua Monte de Santa Catarina
description: Just outside the entrance to the official camping (Parque Campismo da Penha) is a relatively large parking lot with convenient parking spaces of no fixed length. Lots of shade. Avoid driving uphill from the north (Quintas) as there are steep inclines and narrow streets. Better access if you drive from near Guimaraes center. Public toilets are a short walk away towards the main car park and church (unknown opening hours).

title: (4470) Maia - R. Castanheira
description: Laundry in the gallery of Auchan!!

name: Parque Campismo de Penha
title: (4810) Parque Campismo de Penha
description: Great campsite with pool and restaurant. Very friendly staff. Shaded and in the trees. At the top of the gondola/cable car so perfect for visiting this beautiful little town and the rock structures of Penha.

title: (4475) Maia - 329 Rua Bernardino Machado
description: Great place to wash even big campervans. Helpful staff and fair prices.

title: (4480-659) Vila do Conde - 582 Avenida do Brasil
title_short: (4480-659) Vila do Conde - 582 Avenida do Brasil
description: Parking at the back of some buildings and a restaurant, quiet area at least during the week, we spent one night, near the beach. At night there is enough room.

title: (4810) Guimaraes - R. das 3 Bicas
description: Semi-quiet, many couples go up, good to spend the day, safe, incredible views

title_short: (4485-860) Vilar do Pinheiro - 1302 Travessa Jose Martins Maia
description: Seller campingaz. Bottle 907 in exchange for an empty one.

title: (4805) Briteiros - N309
description: Quiet location, right on the Citania de Briteiros. No service.

title: (4730-458) Vila de Prado - N201
description: Fuel pump. Supermarket. Washing machine. The bakery. kiosk. ATM

title: (4740) - CM1026
description: Great place to spend the day, however, not sure if it's safe to spend the night. Right next to the river. Free.

title_short: (4810) Guimarães - 8 Rua Nossa Senhora da Penha

Large car park at the Santuario de Penha. Very nice and quiet
Beautiful Sunset and View

title_short: (4810) Guimarães - 9 Rua Nossa Senhora da Penha
description: Parking easily accessible and with a lot of shade. It is a very quiet and endearing area just 10 minutes from Guimaraes.

title: (4810) Guimarães - 17 N101-2
description: Below another car park opposite the restaurants, this car park is quieter and better equipped for spending the night. We found a flat spot next to the big rock.

title: (4470-558) Vila Nova da Telha -

title_short: (4490-518) Póvoa de Varzim - 588 Rua da Imprensa Regional

title: (4470-407) Maia - 390B Rua José Maria Carvalho Ramos
title_short: (4470-407) Maia - 390B Rua José Maria Carvalho Ramos
description: Parking lot for the Metro and Commercial Area. It has a lot of space and is safe. It has the Metro station "Parque Industrial" where you can buy the ticket to visit Maia, Porto, Matosinhos, etc. There is an Ecopath nearby that goes towards the Maia Zoo. It can be busy during the day . It has Auchan….relatively close, as well as restaurants

title: (4570) Aguçadoura - 1562 Rua da Codixeira
description: Superb picnic area below the big parking (it is noisy), with barbecues and water available (currently water under construction because of the stadium site). We stayed at night with CC heavy weight, no noise, beach 100m ........ access without any weight limit and size .... much better than parking above ...... thirty places all around ...

title: (4490-013) Póvoa de Varzim - 131 Avenida dos Pescadores
title_short: (4490-013) Póvoa de Varzim - 131 Avenida dos Pescadores
description: Old soccer field. Possible to stay overnight. Calm place. PAY.

title: (4740-141) Apúlia - 32 Rua da Igreja
description:
Municipal car park behind the church. A few small trees for some shade and clean public toilets nearby. 5min walk from the center and 5min walk from the beach.
Quiet and residential place, we parked our 7m motorhome there across several places. The parking lot was empty in the middle of the week in August and we only stayed there for the day. Do not hesitate to try to spend the night there, then modify the sheet, we did not see any prohibition sign.

title: (4740-051) Apúlia - 79 Rua do Açude
description: Parking in between some trees, next to a road so its not 100% quiet but i will do for one night

title: (4570) Aguçadoura - 1532 Rua da Codixeira
description: Some nighttime locals joyriding there cars was quite entertaining. Otherwise chilled spot

name: Escola EB1/Jl Aldeia - Aguçadoura
title: (4495-002) Escola EB1/Jl Aldeia - Aguçadoura
description: Quiet parking next to the beach. Being the dunes you cannot see the sea, but it is next to the access walkway. There is a shower for bathers coming off the beach, there are also recycling bins and a supermarket next door, with a very friendly man. There is a bar nearby to use the bathroom if you don't have one.

title: (4490-079) A Ver-o-Mar - 134 Rua do Sargaceiro
description: Parking lots by the coast, you can spend the night but without camping.  Direct access to the beach and sea.

title: (4570-218) Póvoa de Varzim - 10 Rua da Praia
title_short: (4570-218) Póvoa de Varzim - 10 Rua da Praia
description: Parking very close to the beach, a few people.

description: Drinking water - Repsol station

title: (4445-416) Ermesinde - 3 Rua Ponte dos Moinhos

title: (4740) Apúlia - Unnamed Road
description: Take the end of the parking of the beach of ramala

title: (4740) - N13
description: LIDL parking lot. There are two motorhome parking spaces. Parking overnight is not prohibited. It was an emergency option for us in the van. Nobody complained, good if you can't find anything else or want to go shopping in the morning. Overall, quite quiet there, Lidl is open from 8.30 a.m.

title: (4495-031) Póvoa de Varzim - 20 Rua da Praia
title_short: (4495-031) Póvoa de Varzim - 20 Rua da Praia
description:
Ideal place to spend the night. Restaurant, supermarket, playground nearby.
Trash can.
Beautiful beach.
WE a little noisy by quad that spend the night.

title: (4495) Aguçadoura, - Marginal da Caturela
description:
A beautiful pitch in direct on the beach 25m to the sea. No infrastructure (toilet, etc) available. From time to time cars pass by at night. Otherwise very quiet.
Do not open awning or place tables or rows outside.

title: (4495-031) Póvoa de Varzim - 156 Rua da Praia
title_short: (4495-031) Póvoa de Varzim - 156 Rua da Praia
description: Public parking. Quiet and safe place. Do not open the awning, tables or chairs outdoors.

title: (4495) Póvoa de Varzim - Rua da Marginal
title_short: (4495) Póvoa de Varzim - Rua da Marginal
description: Quiet and safe place. Do not open the awning, tables or chairs outdoors.

title: (4495-052) Póvoa de Varzim - 42 Marginal do Cruzeiro
title_short: (4495-052) Póvoa de Varzim - 42 Marginal do Cruzeiro
description: Small nice and quiet car park for one night in total autonomy, no service. At the bottom of a dead end. You can leave the van or camper there and do everything on foot or by bike.

title: (4495) Póvoa de Varzim - 58 Rua da Marginal
title_short: (4495) Póvoa de Varzim - 58 Rua da Marginal
description: Good beach all year round. Quiet and safe place. Ideal for visiting Aver-O-Mar and Póvoa de Varzim on foot or by bike.

title: (4810) Infantas - 189 Travessa 24 de Junho
description: Quite location by the wood on meadow. Hard to camp anywhere around. No service here.

title: (4740) Fão - LI Rua de Angola
description: Close to the river and view to the river. Roads are narrow.

name: Vila Chã Camping
title: (4485) Vila Chã Camping
description:
Once you see the blue camping signs,  turn off Sat Nav. DO NOT turn left at the crossroads, signed dead end you will get stuck. Go straight on until you see another blue camp sign = Porto.
Few km away from Humberto Delgado airport.
Quiet site with good washrooms and showers. A well stocked shop all year used by locals on site and a bar.
There is a restaurant on site and one just outside.
The beaches are lovely and one has a safe bathing area with lifeguards. All are 10 min walking. I was told to be very careful of leaving my bike at the Metro station as it could get stolen.

title: (4440) Valongo - Unnamed Road
description: High place, with beautiful views and quiet. It is near a swing that is frequently visited during the day but to sleep it is a very good place. Access is by quite broken tracks and with a lot of inclination, recommended 4x4.

title: (4485) Vila Chã - 139 Rua da Laderça
description: Public parking with great views of the sea. No supply. Small snack available.

title: (4810) Calvos - 350 EM579 2
description: Parking in the ground, near the Lapinho sanctuary. No services, but the possibility of spending the night. View of the valley. Only concern, the sanctuary rings every hour ...?

title: (4810) Calvos - 1541 Rua da Lapinha
description: Picnic area next to a sanctuary with parking spaces suitable for long vans. Fountain with drinking water and rubbish bins. Very calm.

title: (4740) Apúlia - 73 Rua da Colónia
description: Sea view parking, trash, no service, big

title: (4830-657) Santo Emilião - 40 Rua da Fábrica
description:
Between small parking and nature corner
there is just an establishment at the end that offers meals dance etc so a little noise but nothing very embarrassing
access is easy
the edge of the shady water nice for a small breaststroke for children.
poor road
the communal employees crossed on our arrival gave us the green light ...

free but no service

description: Green areas and filling and emptying service.

title: (4580) Lordelo - 100 Avenida Joaquim Mota
description: Quiet place with an excellent green park

title: (4470-558) Moreira - 302 Rua das Oliveiras
description: Park of Metro Parking "Pedras Rubras". The terrain is sloping a bit. It has a lot of space available and it is safe. At the Metro station (50 mts) to reach Maia, Porto, Matosinhos, etc. Personal restaurants time.

title: (4830) Santo Emilião - 7 N310
description: Very quiet day and night parking on the parking lot of the water fountain at 30M provide a big end but the free wc behind the small entrance building close at 8pm possible to sleep on the church parking if the other is full may be close to the road.

title: (4485-702) Vila Chã - 151 Rua da Praia Nova
title_short: (4485-702) Vila Chã - 151 Rua da Praia Nova
description: Parking day and night in front of the beach with beach bar shower bathrooms with schedule. It is a quiet place with small beach. For those who seek tranquility.

title: (4440-703) Valongo -
description: Up a tough climb in 2WD but easy in 4x4. view of the whole quiet city and 360 degree panorama

title: (4485-864) Vila Chã - 21 Largo dos Pescadores
description: Free toilet by the sea

title: (4440-578) Valongo -
description: Uncontrolled parking. Access by dirt and gravel road, but easily doable by van. Nice view of the surrounding towns. Calm.

title: (4740-323) Fão - 6 Avenida Doutor Henrique Barros Lima
title_short: (4740-323) Fão - 6 Avenida Doutor Henrique Barros Lima
description:
You can surely park during the day. You have a "Pousada da Juventude" in front, which is a sort of hostel, and it has a swimming pool, showers, and other things you can use, as long as you pay their fee. 
This place is located exactly in the path of El Camiño de Santiago, so it's easy to find many pilgrims here.

Self-service laundry
